title: Tam Lin: A Modern, Queer Retelling
description: After a fight with his fiance, Tom Lane needs a change of pace--more accurately, an escape so he can lick his wounds. He travels to Ireland in search of his Ulster-Scots roots. There, he meets Fergus and Aoife, married tour guides looking to show Tom a little more than the sights. Tom thinks he might be falling for the couple, but he just might be falling into a fae trap.
author: T.J. Deschamps
